name: Dunjo's quest
description:
Dunjo needs your help. He is trapped in a dark creepy dungeon.

Open the doors and find your way out.

retro platforming with a twist.

this game was created for the openjam

feedback is great dm me on twitter

or leave a comment.

more levels soon!
